colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI BSTAN 'GRO DPAL MGON DAM PA BDE THANG ZHABS DRUNG AER DE NI MKHAN PO SNGAGS DANG 'BREL BA'I MA nI RIL BSGRUB KYI CHO GA 'KHYER BDE BA ZHIG DGOS ZHES BKA' NAN CHEN PO YANG DU BSKUL BA BRTEN NAS PAn RGAN SNYOMS LAS PA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN DPAL BZANG POS ^PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DANG, RGYAL BA LNGA PA CHEN PO LEGS BSHAD RNAMS LAS BTUS TE YAR KHRAL SBYAR BAS YI GE PA DKA' CHEN NGAG DBANG CHOS LDAN NO, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
